snippet.title: Women's woodwork wonders on show at open day
snippet.content: A FREE "ladies only" open day will be held at the Caloundra Woodworking Club on August 30 from 1pm. Head along to see what ingenious items the female club members have made in timber. If you have ever wanted to have a go at woodworking but have been hesitant, now is your chance to give it a try. The female club members will tell why they joined the group and what inspired and creative experiences they have had as a result. Refreshments will be provided. The club is at Ulm St South, Caloundra. Phone 0429 966 811 for more information. The 2017 membership and joining fees will be waived for any women joining before December 30. Caloundra Woodworking Club was recently honoured to host federal, state and local government members at the opening of its building extension, which was funded by grants from the three levels of government.
